src_original: sa imān daśākuśalān karmapathān prahāya daśakuśalakarmapathapratiṣṭhitaḥ parāṃsteṣveva pratiṣṭhāpayati /
tgt_original: 「是菩薩離十不善業道，亦令眾生住十善業道。

src_original: sa bhūyasyā mātrayā sarvasattvānāmantike hitacittatāmutpādayati /  sukhacittatāṃ maitracittatāṃ kṛpācittatāṃ dayācittatāmanugrahacittatāmārakṣācittatāṃ samacittatāmacāryacittatāṃ śāstṛcittatāmutpādayati /
tgt_original: 為眾生深求——勝心、好心、樂心、憐愍心、慈悲心、利益心、守護心、我所有心、大師心、攝取心、受取心。

src_original: tasyaivaṃ bhavati - kudṛṣṭipatitā bateme sattvā viṣamamatayo viṣamāśayā utpathagahanacāriṇaḥ /
tgt_original: 」作是念： 此諸眾生，甚可憐愍，墮種種邪意、邪見，行邪險道；

src_original: te 'smābhirbhūtapathasamyagdṛṣṭimārgayāthātathye pratiṣṭhāpayitavyāḥ /
tgt_original: 我今應令住在真實正見道中。

src_original: bhinnavigṛhītacittavivādopapannā bateme sattvāḥ satatasamitaṃ krodhopanāhasaṃdhukṣitāḥ /
tgt_original: 是諸眾生，種類不同，互相諍競。 常懷忿恚，瞋惱熾盛；

src_original: te 'smābhiranuttare mahāmaitryupasaṃhāre pratiṣṭhāpayitavyāḥ /
tgt_original: 然我當令住無上大慈。

src_original: atṛptā bateme sattvāḥ paravittābhilāṣiṇo viṣamājīvānucaritāḥ
tgt_original: 是諸眾生，無有厭足，貪求他利，邪命自活；

src_original: / te 'smābhiḥ pariśuddhakāyavāṅmanaskarmāntājīvikāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayitavyāḥ /
tgt_original: 我當令住清淨身、口、意業。

src_original: rāgadveṣamohatrinidānānugatā bateme sattvā vividhakleśāgnijvālābhiḥsatatasamitaṃ pradīptāḥ /  na ca tato 'tyantaniḥsaraṇopāyaṃ parimārgayanti /
tgt_original: 是諸眾生，在貪欲、瞋恚、愚癡因緣中，常起種種煩惱結使，而不方便求欲自出；

src_original: te 'smābhiḥ sarvakleśapraśame nirupadrave nirvāṇe pratiṣṭhāpayitavyāḥ /
tgt_original: 我當滅其諸苦惱事，令住無苦惱處。

src_original: mahāmohatamastimirapaṭalāvidyāndhakārāvṛtā bateme sattvā mahāndhakāragahanānupraviṣṭāḥ prajñālokasudūrībhūtā mahāndhakārapraskannāḥ kudṛṣṭikāntārasamavasṛtāḥ
tgt_original: 是諸眾生，為無明所翳，入黑闇稠林，不能自出。 離智慧明，入在諸見險惡道中；

src_original: teṣāmasmābhiranāvaraṇaṃ prajñācakṣurviśodhayitavyaṃ yathā sarvadharmayāthātathyāparapraṇayatāṃ pratilapsyante /
tgt_original: 我應救之，使得無礙智慧之眼； 以是慧眼不隨他人，於一切法知如實相。

src_original: mahāsaṃsārāṭavīkāntāramārgaprapannā bateme sattvā ayogakṣemiṇo 'nāśvāsaprāptā mahāprapātapatitā  nirayatiryagyoniyamalokagatiprapātābhimukhāḥ kudṛṣṭiviṣamajālānuparyavanaddhā mohagahanasaṃchannā
tgt_original: 是諸眾生，墮在生死長流，欲墮地獄、畜生、餓鬼、阿修羅坑，入邪曲網中。 種種煩惱惡草所覆，無有導師，不生出心。

src_original: mithyāmārgavipathaprayātā jātyandhībhūtāḥ pariṇāyakavikalā aniḥsaraṇe niḥsaraṇasaṃjñino
tgt_original: 道言非道，非道言道。

src_original: namucipāśabaddhā viṣayataskaropagṛhītāḥ kuśalapariṇāyakavirahitā mārāśayagahanānupraviṣṭā
tgt_original: 魔民怨賊常共隨逐，無有善師。

src_original: buddhāśayadūrībhūtāḥ /
tgt_original: 隨順魔意，遠離佛法；

src_original: te 'smābhirevaṃvidhāt saṃsārāṭavīkāntāradurgāduttārayitavyā abhayapure ca sarvajñatānagare nirupadrave nirupatāpe pratiṣṭhāpayitavyāḥ /
tgt_original: 如是眾生，我應令度此諸生死險惡道，得住無畏、無衰一切智慧城。

src_original: mahaughormyāmathairnimagnā bateme sattvāḥ kāmabhavāvidyādṛṣṭyoghasamavasṛṣṭāḥ saṃsārasrotonuvāhinastṛṣṇānadīprapannā  mahāvegagrastā avilokanasamarthāḥ kāmavyāpādavihiṃsāvitarkapratānānucaritāḥ satkāyadṛṣṭyudakarākṣasagṛhītāḥ
tgt_original: 是諸眾生，為欲流、有流、見流、無明流所漂，種種罪業濤波所覆。 沒在愛河隨生死波浪，為洄澓所轉不能自出，為欲覺、瞋覺、惱覺鹹水淹爛，為身見羅剎之所執持。

src_original: kāmagahanāvartānupraviṣṭā nandīrāgamadhyasaṃchannā asmimānasthalotsannā dauḥśīlyaviṣamācārāntaḥpuṭībhūtāḥ
tgt_original: 入五欲深林為喜染所著吹，在我慢陸地，甚可憐愍，無洲無救。

src_original: te 'smābhirmahākaruṇākuśalamūlabalenoddhṛtya nirupadrave 'rajasi kṣeme śive 'bhaye sarvabhayatrāsāpagate sarvajñatāratnadvīpe pratiṣṭhāpayitavyāḥ
tgt_original: 如是眾生，我今應以大悲牢堅智慧之船，載至諸安隱、無怖畏一切智洲。

src_original: saśokaparidevānucarite tṛṣṇānigaḍabandhane māyāśāṭhyāvidyāgahanasaṃchanne traidhātukacārake /  te 'smābhiḥ sarvatraidhātukaviveke sarvaduḥkhopaśame 'nāvaraṇanirvāṇe pratiṣṭhāpayitavyāḥ /  ātmātmīyābhiniviṣṭā bateme sattvāḥ skandhālayānuccalitāścaturviparyāsānuprayātāḥ
tgt_original: 是諸眾生，多苦可愍，閉在生死憂悲苦惱牢獄。

src_original: ṣaḍāyatanaśūnyagrāmasaṃniśritāścaturmahābhūtoragābhidrutāḥ skandhavadhakataskarābhighātitā  aparimāṇaduḥkhapratisaṃvedinaḥ /
tgt_original: 多懷貪恚、愛憎，墮四顛倒，為四大毒蛇所害，為五陰怨家所殘，喜染詐賊所陷，在六入空聚受無量苦惱；

src_original: te 'smābhiḥ paramasukhe sarvaniketavigame pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā yaduta sarvāvaraṇaprahāṇanirvāṇe
tgt_original: 我應破其生死牢獄，令得自在無礙涅槃，安隱快樂。

src_original: / hīnalīnadīnādhimuktā bateme sattvā agryasarvajñajñānacittavikalāḥ sati niḥsaraṇe mahāyāne śrāvakapratyekabuddhayānāvatīrṇamatayaḥ /
tgt_original: 是諸眾生，甚可憐愍，狹劣小心，樂於少利，縮沒無有一切智心。
